# RWD

## All breakpoints

```
export const breakpoints = {
  sm: 0,
  md: 768,
  lg: 1024,
  xl: 1200,
  xxl: 1860,
  xxxl: 2500,
};
```

##  Standardized Stitches variants

```
  layout={{
    "@initial": "mobile",
    "@xl": "smallDesktop", // > 1200
    "@xxl": "desktop", // > 1860
    "@xxxl": "largeDesktop", // > 2500
  }}
```
